function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Regular inspection and maintenance of the chamber to prevent leakage","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement surface treatment to reduce adsorption effect, use standardized test protocols","category":"Wall and floors treatment","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement air filtration systems and regular disinfection protocols to reduce the risk of disease transmission","category":"Air
